title: BRIC ILS Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for Senior Research Fellow Posts
description: The Institute of Life Science (BRIC ILS)has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Senior Research Fellow Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the M.Sc, M.E/ M.Tech., M.Pharm., and  M.V.Sc can grab this chance and apply for the BRIC ILS Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested candidates can attend the walk-in at the address...
